A phenomenal game! Logic, humour and a story driven adventure (solo or with a partner) with endless possibilities of its replayability (thanks to the modding and and level creating scene). It was worth its price on it's premiere, 5 years ago, now and every time I will be revisiting this fabulous game in the future.

Final verdict: 10/10
It's a great game, even a decade after its release. Great story and puzzles, if you want to use that thing between your eyes.

This game is fucking fun. This is without a doubt one of my favorite single player games ever. The story is engaging and adds to the feel of the game (and the level design). The concept this game is built around is superb in execution, and I will never forget this series.
There's enough community content that you really don't need a Portal 3, 4, or 5.
